src:
ARMYs participate in fun #ARMYSelcaDay on Twitter + trending number two worldwide on Twitter
04 Nov 2019, 17:21 by sl278



#ARMYSelcaDay is trending number two online on Twitter as fans participate in a selca challenge mirroring the BTS members' pictures.
Fans have been posting their own creative takes on replicating some of their favorite photos. 






Did you participate in the challenge?
